text: The area of Kamiiso District in Oshima Subprefecture. is a district located in Oshima Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 48,470 and a density of 71.18 persons per km². The total area is 680.95 km². ==Towns== *Kikonai *Shiriuchi ==Merger== *On February 1, 2006 the town of Kamiiso merged with the town of Ōno, from Kameda District, to form the new city of Hokuto. Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Kamiiso District, Hokkaido
